languages.text: "Хо! Я просто решил развеяться, погоняв худосочного ксеноса по потолку! Присоединяйся, эттфатер!"
"Ho there! I decided to unwind by chasing this stringy xenos across the ceiling! Join me, Aett-Vater!"
languages.original_text: "Хо! Я просто решил развеяться, погоняв худосочного ксеноса по потолку! Присоединяйся, эттфатер!"

traits.locale_text: "Ho there! I decided to unwind by chasing this stringy xenos across the ceiling! Join me, Aett-Vater!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ho there! I decided to unwind by chasing this stringy xenos across the ceiling! Join me, Aett-Vater!"

languages.text: “呵，你来了！我正打算活动活动手脚，好好和这条异形毒蛇玩玩呢！狼领，和我一起上！”
languages.original_text: "Ho there! I decided to unwind by chasing this stringy xenos across the ceiling! Join me, Aett-Vater!"

traits.locale_text: “呵，你来了！我正打算活动活动手脚，好好和这条异形毒蛇玩玩呢！狼领，和我一起上！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «¡Ah, hola! ¡He decidido ejercitarme un poco persiguiendo a este xenos esmirriado por el techo! ¡Únete a mí, Aett-Vater!».
languages.original_text: "Ho there! I decided to unwind by chasing this stringy xenos across the ceiling! Join me, Aett-Vater!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Ah, hola! ¡He decidido ejercitarme un poco persiguiendo a este xenos esmirriado por el techo! ¡Únete a mí, Aett-Vater!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Bien le bonjour ! Je me suis dit que j'allais me détendre un peu en pourchassant ce xénos maigrichon. Donnez-moi un coup de main, aett-vater ! »
languages.original_text: "Ho there! I decided to unwind by chasing this stringy xenos across the ceiling! Join me, Aett-Vater!"

traits.locale_text: « Bien le bonjour ! Je me suis dit que j'allais me détendre un peu en pourchassant ce xénos maigrichon. Donnez-moi un coup de main, aett-vater ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ho! Ich will zur Ruhe kommen, indem ich diesen sehnigen Xenos durch die Decke jage! Schließt Euch mir an, Aett-Vater!"
languages.original_text: "Ho there! I decided to unwind by chasing this stringy xenos across the ceiling! Join me, Aett-Vater!"

traits.locale_text: "Ho! Ich will zur Ruhe kommen, indem ich diesen sehnigen Xenos durch die Decke jage! Schließt Euch mir an, Aett-Vater!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「やっときたか！俺はこの天井をわたりあるく、筋張った異種族を追いかけて遊んでやろうと思ってな！一緒にやろうじゃないか、アエット＝ヴァテル！」
languages.original_text: "Ho there! I decided to unwind by chasing this stringy xenos across the ceiling! Join me, Aett-Vater!"

traits.locale_text: 「やっときたか！俺はこの天井をわたりあるく、筋張った異種族を追いかけて遊んでやろうと思ってな！一緒にやろうじゃないか、アエット＝ヴァテル！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Baksana! Şu cılız zenoyu tavanda kovalayarak stres atmaya karar verdim. Katıl bana Aett-Vater!"
languages.original_text: "Ho there! I decided to unwind by chasing this stringy xenos across the ceiling! Join me, Aett-Vater!"

traits.locale_text: "Baksana! Şu cılız zenoyu tavanda kovalayarak stres atmaya karar verdim. Katıl bana Aett-Vater!"
